#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	string daftar[50001];
	long N;
	long T;
	//string dummy;
	bool ada;
	long i;
	long sum;
	cin>>T;
	while (T--){
		cin>>N;
		sum = 0;

        //printf("%ld%ld\n", T,N);
        //scanf("\n");
		for (i=0; i<N; i++){
			cin>>daftar[i];
		}

        //printf("Ypo\n");
		sort(daftar, daftar+N);

        /*for (i=0; i<N; i++){
            cout<<daftar[i]<<endl;
        }*/
        //printf("DIA\n");
		sum = 0;
		for (i=0; i<N; i++){
			if (i==0){
                //cout<<"Pertama"<<endl;
				ada = true;
				sum++;
			}else{
				if (daftar[i] == daftar[i-1]){
                    //cout<<"YES"<<endl;
					if (ada){
						ada = false;
						sum--;
					}else{
						ada = true;
						sum++;
					}
				}else{
				    //cout<<"YO"<<endl;
					ada = true;
					sum++;
				}
			}
		}
		printf("%ld\n", sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
